long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly track and manage your job applications with our powerful Google Chrome extension. Collect key details of the jobs you've applied to, including company name, job title, application date, and status. Our extension presents your application data in a clear, organized table format, making it easy to stay on top of your job search progress. 

Centralized dashboard to log and reference all your job applications. Customizable categories to organize applications by status (e.g., "Applied," "Apply later)  Detailed application records with fields for company, job title, and application link. Attachment support to store resumes, cover letters, and notes for each application.
